name: Infinite Scroll
desc: This web app endlessly loads random Unsplash images as you scroll, creating an infinite visual feed.

name: Motivational Quote App
desc: A simple and elegant web application that displays motivational quotes to inspire users. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Music Player
desc: This project is a clean, intuitive web-based music player, crafted with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, enabling users to enjoy their favorite songs directly in the browser.

name: Custom Countdown
desc: A simple and customizable countdown timer built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Joke Teller App
desc: A fun and interactive web application that tells jokes using a combination of the Joke API and Web Speech APIs.

name: Typing Test
desc: A simple web-based application to test and improve your typing speed and accuracy.
